text: Mobile Homes is a 2017 Canadian drama film directed by Vladimir de Fontenay. It was screened in the Directors' Fortnight section at the 2017 Cannes Film Festival. ==Cast== * Imogen Poots as Ali * Callum Turner as Evan * Callum Keith Rennie as Robert * Frank Oulton as Bone ==Reception== On review aggregator website Rotten Tomatoes, the film holds an approval rating of 58% based on 19 reviews, and an average rating of 6.05/10. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2017 films Category:2017 drama films Category:Canadian films Category:Canadian drama films Category:English- language films
title: Mobile Homes (2017 film)
